The 'Rogue-like' tag on SteamDB lists games that share the characteristics of roguelike video games. These titles offer procedurally generated content, where each playthrough presents unique challenges and experiences. Players often face permadeath, meaning that character progression may be lost upon death, encouraging strategic gameplay and learning from mistakes. Roguelike games typically include elements such as turn-based combat, randomized levels, and character development through loot acquisition and skill progression.
